thread.title: Margaret Cho wants in on the 'Saturday Night Live' action as Ben Carson
thread.title_full: Margaret Cho wants in on the 'Saturday Night Live' action as Ben Carson

author: USA TODAY
title: Margaret Cho wants in on the 'Saturday Night Live' action as Ben Carson
text:
Margaret Cho wants in on the 'Saturday Night Live' action as Ben Carson Erin Jensen, USA TODAY Published 8:43 a.m. ET Feb. 8, 2017 | Updated 50 minutes ago 5 Shares 
Paging Dr. Carson. Will Dr. Carson please come to the 'SNL' set? (Photo: Gabriel Olsen/FilmMagic and AFP PHOTO / SAUL LOEBSAUL LOEB/AFP/Getty Images) 
The casting director for Saturday Night Live should just take the week off. 
Like Rosie O'Donnell , who said she was up for playing President Trump's chief strategist Steve Bannon on NBC's sketch comedy show, Margaret Cho has volunteered to play Ben Carson, the nominee for secretary of Housing and Urban Development. Hey @Rosie ...also @nbcsnl do you need someone for Ben Carson, I've literally been practicing how to hold full conversations while sleeping. pic.twitter.com/EP33GTFR8m — Margaret Cho (@margaretcho) February 8, 2017 
The Fashion Police co-host shared that she has been "practicing how to hold full conversations while sleeping," in preparation for the opportunity which may or may not come her way. O'Donnell tweeted her support writing "Yo cho – they call – we show" followed by three red heart emojis. @margaretcho @nbcsnl - yo cho - they call - we show ❤️❤️❤️
